name: RYNU
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/UDrFcn9ZeJEcyUJB7

   One day, Rynu woke up unconsciously in a lab not knowing that is he was being experimented with new weapon which is "time-control" by a wicked company. Being clueless and shocked, all Rynu has to do is run away from the place and the people who's chasing him.

Ready to show your skills and face the challenge? 

Rynu by Enits
